item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Weapon sockets. 
- Item Effect: All Accuracy +1
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Red Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Red Crystals found near Khuruto Cave.

item.name: Arrow Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Plunder. Arrow Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
